import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiMercadoLivreService } from '../services/api-mercado-livre.service'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { Itens } from '../models/itens'; @Component({ selector: 'app-menu', templateUrl: './menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./menu.component.css'] }) export class MenuComponent implements OnInit { inputValue: string = ''; itens: Itens[] = []; constructor(private apiML: ApiMercadoLivreService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getItens(this.inputValue); } searchItens(): void { this.getItens(this.inputValue); } private getItens(searchValue: string): void { this.apiML.getItens(searchValue).subscribe( (result) => { this.itens = result; }, (error) => { console.log(error); } ); } }
